body_html:
I updated the gist: https://gist.github.com/mrry/ee5dbcfdd045fa48a27d56664411d41c

It's not perfect, since you can't tell what version of TensorFlow is installed without importing the TensorFlow native extension, which would presumably fail! (Perhaps there's some way to scrape pip for this information, but I haven't tried.)

Closing this issue for now.

body:
I updated the gist: https://gist.github.com/mrry/ee5dbcfdd045fa48a27d56664411d41c

It's not perfect, since you can't tell what version of TensorFlow is installed without importing the TensorFlow native extension, which would presumably fail! (Perhaps there's some way to scrape `pip` for this information, but I haven't tried.)

Closing this issue for now.
